TopicTitle: What I did that got me into KSP.

Articles.Content:
You know the drill, "I found .... because of ....".

But really, this is how I found out I liked KSP.

I used to play with bottle rockets, you know, soda with mints dropped into them. It was really fun back in the day.

I still do it to this day.

In fact, I just got home from doing a little soda light show with the bottle rockets.

One day, I came across KSP when I was looking up the word "Rockets".

I bought it and started playing for days and weeks.

That's the story of how I found it.
